Author: the_real_blobfish
Text: OKAY SO.   I *supposedly* (according to my shitty bathroom scale) weigh >!36ish kg (\~80lbs)!< and I'm 155cm (5'1) tall.  That would give me a BMI of around >!15!<.  Even according to my grandma's (much clearer, possible also inaccurate) scale, I weigh about >!39.5kg (87lbs)!< which would give me a BMI of >!16.65!<.  There's  No Fucking W A Y  i could be that skinny. Not even "underweight".   I  r e f u s e
